doc:
Barry Robins https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barry_Robins 0 Barry Robins (January 12, 1945 – April 1, 1986), was an American stage, film and television actor. He was best known for his leading role as Cotton in Stanley Kramer's 1971 movie, Bless the Beasts and Children. Barry_Robins ( January_12_,_1945 – April_1_,_1986 ) , was an_American_stage , film_and_television_actor . He was_best_known for his_leading_role as Cotton in Stanley_Kramer 's_1971_movie , Bless the_Beasts_and_Children .
